ComicInfo.Summary:
“SASQUATCH” Part 5 of 6.
Seeking safe haven, Lewis & Clark pursue an alliance with the Teton tribe, who are rightfully as wary of the white man as they are of the beasts in the forest.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-15 18:54:19. [CVDB550415]
